page.title: 08Interesting People
page.content: Mrs.E.Ades has lived in the village for all her 72 years. She works part- time in the village shop. She is a member of the Horticultural Society. Mrs.E.Berry has also lived in East Hoathly all her life. She works at Booker Health Foods. She belongs to the Carnival Society. She does most of her shopping in the village. She goes into Uckfield on Fridays. Mrs.K.Petit has always lived and worked in East Hoathly. She used to be a pupil at the school and then a Dinner Lady. She is the Secretary of the Carnival Society. Mr.A.Petit runs the Rifle Range. Mrs.Turner is 81 and has lived here over 60 years. She belongs to the W.I. and the Lunch Club. She is a relation of Thomas Turner, the Diarist, who ran a shop in East Hoathly in the 18th Century.
